jobs.title: Client Relationship Manager (w/SEO Knowledge) Needed
jobs.description:
We are recruiting an Account Manager for our SEO clients for up to $500 a month

Someone lively, fun, bubbly, good on video & phone with clients and able to talk technical SEO on a call!

You will work alongside our SEO team and manage a portfolio of SEO clients. We have a very experienced SEO team and this role would suit someone looking to build on their SEO knowledge and grow with the role.

As a big part of the role is related to creating and nurturing relationships with clients, you will need to be a confident individual with the ability to interact well with others on both a personal and professional level and to thrive in a fast-paced, high pressure environment.

Responsibilities will include but are not limited to:

· Working closely with clients to ensure a full understanding of their business, digital marketing needs and priorities.

· Creating trusting relationships with clients by ensuring the client has visibility on our work and the related results/benefits as well as actively engaging

Client website and competitor website analysis including analysis of backlink profiles and strategies

Conducting keyword research and technical analysis on websites including SEO auditing

Writing SEO proposals and SEO reports

Working with ethical link building techniques and developing external relationships

Investigating and working with the latest SEO software

· On-site and off-site optimisation

Delivering ROI and suggesting improvements to our SEO department
Liaising with potential and current clients by phone, email and some face-to-face meetings

· Other ad hoc SEO tasks

· Conducting on-site and off-site SEO audits and competitor analysis.

· Analysing website performance and making recommendations.

Qualifications & Experienc:

The ideal candidate will be ambitious, resourceful, dependable, technical and have:

· 1 year + experience in a client-facing position.

· Excellent interpersonal skills and the ability to empathise with the stress and pain points of clients’ day-to-day jobs

· A good understanding of technical SEO issues that may affect a website.

· In-depth knowledge of Google Analytics and Google Search Console

· Knowledge of some SEO tools such as Moz Pro, CognitiveSeo, SEO Profiler, Majestic, Ahrefs etc

· Be able to demonstrate the ability to make sound decisions and meet deadlines

· A strong commitment to “white hat” SEO practices and a passion for digital marketing

· A desire to continue expanding their SEO knowledge, demonstrated by keeping up to date with industry news, such as Search Engine algorithm changes

· Strong communication and organisational skills and the ability to multi task and prioritise your own work load as well as efficiently delegate work to other team members

Benefits:
Learn Very Very Fast
Work with TedX Speakers
Work with ultramarathon runners, speakers of multiple languages
Work with a fully digital and remote team across different timezones
Build and grow entirely in the cloud
International work-cations where we meet and work in a foreign country for a week
Worst case - learn tons, get an amazing reference and move forward
Best case - go full time, build your personal brand and work from anywhere in the world
Take your digital skills you learn with us and apply to any job in any industry

jobs.title: Full Stack Digital Marketing Intern
jobs.description:
Pearl Lemon is looking for a highly motivated and driven person to help drive forward our ambitious growth plans throughout 2020 and beyond. You will be an important part of a tight-knit team who have a hands-on approach and are passionate about taking the business to the next level.

Reporting directly into the Marketing Director, you will be responsible for the planning, coordination, and implementation of all marketing activities.
There will be a focus on developing the Pearl Lemon and our client’s brand through thought, leadership, content creation, design, research, and other steep learning-based tasks.

We are looking for someone who prides themselves on their speed of communication, attention-to-detail, and meticulous planning skills, but can adapt to change in a very fast-moving environment.

A strong understanding of digital marketing is essential, as is exceptional people and communication skills to help develop team members who you will manage directly.

POSSIBLE responsibilities will include:

Developing a lifecycle marketing strategy to drive multi-channel marketing campaigns across all channels (including PPC, SEO, email, ABM, social, PR and events)
Collaborating across departments and functions to deliver an effective content marketing strategy and editorial plan to meet the business objectives.
Creating and evolving an account-based marketing strategy to designed to resonate with potential high value leads and help exceed set MRR targets.
Building a social marketing strategy to enhance Pearl Lemon’s social media presence on platforms such as LinkedIn, Twitter, and Facebook.
Optimising our marketing automation and lead nurturing processes through email, content, and social channels.
Taking full ownership of our events marketing strategy and identifying new opportunities to develop awareness of the brand within the cyber security industry.
Regular reporting against defined KPI’s to highlight effectiveness of all campaigns against business goals.
Line management and professional development of team members.
Managing relationships with third-party suppliers and agencies.
Creation of graphics and visuals as needed.
Assisting the Marketing Director and other members as needed.

Required skills and experience:

Exceptional communication skills, verbal and written.
Being punctual and quick to respond and communicate-daily.
Experience with Word Press and SEO
Proven people management track record.
Ability to build strong working relationships with colleagues and external suppliers.
Proven experience of implementing successful (measurable ROI) content marketing strategies.
Experience of partnering with Sales teams to implement successful ABM campaigns.
Demonstrable experience delivering engaging event management strategies.
Can deliver succinct campaign performance summaries backed by expert analytic capability.
Incredibly fast learner.

Benefits:

Learn Very Very Fast
Work with TedX Speakers
Work with ultramarathon runners, speakers of multiple languages
Work with a fully digital and remote team across different timezones
Build and grow entirely in the cloud
International work-cations where we meet and work in a foreign country for a week

jobs.title: Mac Product Launch Specialist
jobs.description:
**ABOUT**

Pearl Lemon is a multiple-award winning SEO & Lead Generation Agency based in the heart of London but serving clients worldwide. With a team of 15 dotted across the UK, USA, Romania, India, Pakistan, Philippines and more they operate around the clock and communicate predominantly through Whatsapp that function more like a silicon-valley-startup and have a work-ethic comparable to investment bankers. It’s not a surprise when you consider their founder Deepak Shukla is an ex-Deloitte consultant and 30x marathon runner. 

**BENEFITS OF WORKING WITH PEARL LEMON**

* Work from the office or from home
* Flexible working hours
* Exponential learning
* A unique work experience being fully remote with a start-up

**Mac Product Launch Specialist**
Pearl Lemon is looking for a highly motivated and driven person to help drive forward our ambitious growth plans throughout 2020 and beyond. You will be an important part of a tight-knit team who have a hands-on approach and are passionate about taking the business to the next level.
The Product Launch Specialist (PLS) is an integral part of our technology team. Reporting directly into the Marketing Director, you will be responsible for the planning, coordination, and implementation of our product launch plans and launch plans for our developing Mac software. 
You will work closely with project teams, management and staff to ensure the necessary resources are involved in, aware of and trained on each release. You will also work closely with development, operational teams and vendors to ensure crucial information is available and communicated in various forms. You will work with marketing, training, and support to develop and execute communication, training and support plans.
There will be a focus on developing the Pearl Lemon and software brands through thought, leadership, content creation, design, research, and other steep learning-based tasks.
We are looking for someone who prides themselves on their speed of communication, attention-to-detail, and meticulous planning skills, but can adapt to change in a very fast-moving environment.
A strong understanding of digital marketing is essential, as is exceptional people and communication skills to help develop team members who you will manage directly.

**POSSIBLE responsibilities will include:**
* Building product launch plans
* Building contact lists
* Compiling competitor research analysis 
* Taking lead on developing KPIs and OKRs for the software
* Helping optimise the software site and social media accounts
* Helping run social media accounts and LinkedIn pages
* Creating and implementing plans for outreach for the software
* Submitting software to directories

**Required skills and experience:**
* Exceptional communication skills, verbal and written.
* Being punctual and quick to respond and communicate-daily.
* Experience with Word Press and SEO
* Incredibly fast learner.

**Benefits**:
* Learn Very Very Fast
* Work with TedX Speakers
* Work with ultramarathon runners, speakers of multiple languages
* Work with a fully digital and remote team across different timezones
* Build and grow entirely in the cloud
* International work-cations where we meet and work in a foreign country for a week
* Worst case - learn tons, get an amazing reference and move forward
* Best case - go full time, build your personal brand and work from anywhere in the world
* Take your digital skills you learn with us and apply to any job in any industry

Pearl Lemon is looking for a highly motivated and driven person to help drive forward our ambitious growth plans throughout 2020 and beyond. You will be an important part of a tight-knit team who have a hands-on approach and are passionate about taking the business to the next level.

Reporting directly to the Marketing Director, you will be responsible for the planning, coordination, and implementation of all lead generation activities.
